SELECT t2.roles,t1.* FROM tb_user t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT( role_id ) AS roleIds, GROUP_CONCAT( role_name ) AS roles FROM tb_role_user GROUP BY user_id ) t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.id where t1.del_flag=0
AND t1.name like concat("%",#{userQuery.name},"%")
AND t2.roleIds like concat("%",#{userQuery.roles},"%")
AND (t1.dept_id = #{userQuery.deptId} OR t1.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM tb_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{userQuery.deptId}, ancestors) ))
